notes: USA-based supplier of Organic Squalane Oil derived from olives (non-GMO) for clean beauty brands and natural cosmetics. Applications: Face oils (20-100%), serums (10-30%), moisturizers (5-15%), hair care (2-5%). Compatible with most oils and emulsions, non-comedogenic. Premium pricing ($60-90/kg for organic olive-derived) with small quantities available (30ml-1 gallon) and multiple sizes for testing. Organic and non-GMO certified. USA-based distribution with international shipping. Product information and usage guidelines available.
